channel.title: Status Page
channel.description: Anyone know whats wrong with the status page? It's getting gayer and gayer everyday. No wait thats sponsored servers, but anyways. New servers won't add if you haven't noticed. Theres Like 6 regular servers on there. I'm just wondering whats wrong with it :)

item.title: Status Page
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

Tbh I hate the speed of which your server goes back up to 100%… I left my Server on over night (it’s a 24/7 server) and it must of got crashed so it went down to 96%, which is fair enough. But it takes the mick when you have to wait 4-5 days to get it back up to 100%… My server has been on non-stop for 3 weeks and it was at 100% for like an hour? And it hasn’t gone back up since. Something needs to be done about the % going up quicker…

Read full topic

item.title: Status Page
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xOlsn1p3rlOx, post:1, topic:275257”]no guy’s read what it says on moparscape!

The bidding for sponsored server & Regular servers is over for this month. If you have a winning bid you have
only 2 days after bidding ended to pay or you will lose your spot. If your bid did not win
check the bidding page after two days to see if you were bumped up.

S-O-A-D.no-ip.biz[/quote]
does not help before i can post when that showed up

Read full topic

item.title: Status Page

item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The site is fine, all you care about is advertising your server on the status page.

[/quote]

It will be fixed within a day or two, guaranteed.[/quote]Ya while there at fixing it… Maybe they can get rid of Sponsored servers Wouldn’t that make Mopar a half decent website again?
